uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player
Interface MediaPlayerEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AudioPlayerComponent, DirectMediaPlayerComponent, EmbeddedMediaListPlayerComponent, EmbeddedMediaPlayerComponent, MediaPlayerEventAdapter
public interface MediaPlayerEventListener

Specification for a component that is interested in receiving event notifications from the media player.

In most cases any event that fires for a media item will also fire for any sub-item, so for example mediaChanged() will fire for the "main" media item and each subsequent sub-item.

Events are likely not raised on the Swing Event Dispatch thread so if updating user interface components in response to these events care must be taken to use SwingUtilities.invokeLater(Runnable).

See Also:
MediaPlayerEventAdapter

newMedia

void newMedia(MediaPlayer mediaPlayer)
New media was opened.

This is raised only for the "main" media item and not for any sub-items.

Parameters:
mediaPlayer - media player that raised the event

subItemPlayed

void subItemPlayed(MediaPlayer mediaPlayer,
                   int subItemIndex)
A sub-item was played.

There is no guarantee the sub-item actually started, but it was at least attempted to be played.

Parameters:
mediaPlayer - media player that raised the event
subItemIndex - index of the sub-item that was played

A sub-item finished playing.

Parameters:

subItemIndex - index of the sub-item that finished playing

endOfSubItems

void endOfSubItems(MediaPlayer mediaPlayer)
The end of the media sub-items was reached.

This event will not be raised if the sub-items are being repeated.

Parameters:
mediaPlayer - media player that raised the event
